response.original_title: How do I get my money out of Binance US? ((Easy Withdrawal Process))
response.overview: Binance.US allows two main types of withdrawals 1➠(888)➽(574)➽(7167): fiat withdrawals (USD to bank) and cryptocurrency withdrawals (sending crypto to another wallet or exchange). +1 (888) 574-7167 If your funds are in USD, you can withdraw directly to your linked bank account using ACH transfer. +1 (888) 574-7167 If your funds are in crypto like Bitcoin or Ethereum, you must send them to an external wallet. +1 (888) 574-7167 Choosing the right option depends on whether you want cash in your bank or crypto in another platform. +1 (888) 574-7167
response.title: How do I get my money out of Binance US? ((Easy Withdrawal Process))
